00052 /* ************ Spacetype/regiontype handling ************** */
00053 
00054 /* keep global; this has to be accessible outside of windowmanager */
00055 static ListBase spacetypes= {NULL, NULL};
00056 
00057 /* not SpaceType itself */
00058 static void spacetype_free(SpaceType *st)
00059 {
00060     ARegionType *art;
00061     PanelType *pt;
00062     HeaderType *ht;
00063     
00064     for (art= st->regiontypes.first; art; art= art->next) {
00065         BLI_freelistN(&art->drawcalls);
00066 
00067         for (pt= art->paneltypes.first; pt; pt= pt->next)
00068             if (pt->ext.free)
00069                 pt->ext.free(pt->ext.data);
00070 
00071         for (ht= art->headertypes.first; ht; ht= ht->next)
00072             if (ht->ext.free)
00073                 ht->ext.free(ht->ext.data);
00074 
00075         BLI_freelistN(&art->paneltypes);
00076         BLI_freelistN(&art->headertypes);
00077     }
00078     
00079     BLI_freelistN(&st->regiontypes);
00080     BLI_freelistN(&st->toolshelf);
00081 
00082 }
00083 
00084 void BKE_spacetypes_free(void)
00085 {
00086     SpaceType *st;
00087     
00088     for (st= spacetypes.first; st; st= st->next) {
00089         spacetype_free(st);
00090     }
00091     
00092     BLI_freelistN(&spacetypes);
00093 }
00094 
00095 SpaceType *BKE_spacetype_from_id(int spaceid)
00096 {
00097     SpaceType *st;
00098     
00099     for (st= spacetypes.first; st; st= st->next) {
00100         if (st->spaceid==spaceid)
00101             return st;
00102     }
00103     return NULL;
00104 }
00105 
00106 ARegionType *BKE_regiontype_from_id(SpaceType *st, int regionid)
00107 {
00108     ARegionType *art;
00109     
00110     for (art= st->regiontypes.first; art; art= art->next)
00111         if (art->regionid==regionid)
00112             return art;
00113     
00114     printf("Error, region type missing in - name:\"%s\", id:%d\n", st->name, st->spaceid);
00115     return st->regiontypes.first;
00116 }

00119 const ListBase *BKE_spacetypes_list(void)
00120 {
00121     return &spacetypes;
00122 }
00123 
00124 void BKE_spacetype_register(SpaceType *st)
00125 {
00126     SpaceType *stype;
00127     
00128     /* sanity check */
00129     stype= BKE_spacetype_from_id(st->spaceid);
00130     if (stype) {
00131         printf("error: redefinition of spacetype %s\n", stype->name);
00132         spacetype_free(stype);
00133         MEM_freeN(stype);
00134     }
00135     
00136     BLI_addtail(&spacetypes, st);
00137 }

00139 /* ***************** Space handling ********************** */

00141 void BKE_spacedata_freelist(ListBase *lb)
00142 {
00143     SpaceLink *sl;
00144     ARegion *ar;
00145     
00146     for (sl= lb->first; sl; sl= sl->next) {
00147         SpaceType *st= BKE_spacetype_from_id(sl->spacetype);
00148         
00149         /* free regions for pushed spaces */
00150         for (ar=sl->regionbase.first; ar; ar=ar->next)
00151             BKE_area_region_free(st, ar);
00152 
00153         BLI_freelistN(&sl->regionbase);
00154         
00155         if (st && st->free) 
00156             st->free(sl);
00157     }
00158     
00159     BLI_freelistN(lb);
00160 }
00161 
00162 ARegion *BKE_area_region_copy(SpaceType *st, ARegion *ar)
00163 {
00164     ARegion *newar= MEM_dupallocN(ar);
00165     Panel *pa, *newpa, *patab;
00166     
00167     newar->prev= newar->next= NULL;
00168     newar->handlers.first= newar->handlers.last= NULL;
00169     newar->uiblocks.first= newar->uiblocks.last= NULL;
00170     newar->swinid= 0;
00171     
00172     /* use optional regiondata callback */
00173     if (ar->regiondata) {
00174         ARegionType *art= BKE_regiontype_from_id(st, ar->regiontype);
00175 
00176         if (art && art->duplicate)
00177             newar->regiondata= art->duplicate(ar->regiondata);
00178         else
00179             newar->regiondata= MEM_dupallocN(ar->regiondata);
00180     }
00181 
00182     if (ar->v2d.tab_offset)
00183         newar->v2d.tab_offset= MEM_dupallocN(ar->v2d.tab_offset);
00184     
00185     newar->panels.first= newar->panels.last= NULL;
00186     BLI_duplicatelist(&newar->panels, &ar->panels);
00187     
00188     /* copy panel pointers */
00189     for (newpa= newar->panels.first; newpa; newpa= newpa->next) {
00190         patab= newar->panels.first;
00191         pa= ar->panels.first;
00192         while (patab) {
00193             if (newpa->paneltab == pa) {
00194                 newpa->paneltab = patab;
00195                 break;
00196             }
00197             patab= patab->next;
00198             pa= pa->next;
00199         }
00200     }
00201     
00202     return newar;
00203 }

00206 /* from lb2 to lb1, lb1 is supposed to be freed */
00207 static void region_copylist(SpaceType *st, ListBase *lb1, ListBase *lb2)
00208 {
00209     ARegion *ar;
00210     
00211     /* to be sure */
00212     lb1->first= lb1->last= NULL;
00213     
00214     for (ar= lb2->first; ar; ar= ar->next) {
00215         ARegion *arnew= BKE_area_region_copy(st, ar);
00216         BLI_addtail(lb1, arnew);
00217     }
00218 }
00219 
00220 
00221 /* lb1 should be empty */
00222 void BKE_spacedata_copylist(ListBase *lb1, ListBase *lb2)
00223 {
00224     SpaceLink *sl;
00225     
00226     lb1->first= lb1->last= NULL;    /* to be sure */
00227     
00228     for (sl= lb2->first; sl; sl= sl->next) {
00229         SpaceType *st= BKE_spacetype_from_id(sl->spacetype);
00230         
00231         if (st && st->duplicate) {
00232             SpaceLink *slnew= st->duplicate(sl);
00233             
00234             BLI_addtail(lb1, slnew);
00235             
00236             region_copylist(st, &slnew->regionbase, &sl->regionbase);
00237         }
00238     }
00239 }

00241 /* facility to set locks for drawing to survive (render) threads accessing drawing data */
00242 /* lock can become bitflag too */
00243 /* should be replaced in future by better local data handling for threads */
00244 void BKE_spacedata_draw_locks(int set)
00245 {
00246     SpaceType *st;
00247     
00248     for (st= spacetypes.first; st; st= st->next) {
00249         ARegionType *art;
00250     
00251         for (art= st->regiontypes.first; art; art= art->next) {
00252             if (set) 
00253                 art->do_lock= art->lock;
00254             else 
00255                 art->do_lock= 0;
00256         }
00257     }
00258 }

00261 /* not region itself */
00262 void BKE_area_region_free(SpaceType *st, ARegion *ar)
00263 {
00264     if (st) {
00265         ARegionType *art= BKE_regiontype_from_id(st, ar->regiontype);
00266         
00267         if (art && art->free)
00268             art->free(ar);
00269         
00270         if (ar->regiondata)
00271             printf("regiondata free error\n");
00272     }
00273     else if (ar->type && ar->type->free)
00274         ar->type->free(ar);
00275     
00276     if (ar->v2d.tab_offset) {
00277         MEM_freeN(ar->v2d.tab_offset);
00278         ar->v2d.tab_offset= NULL;
00279     }
00280 
00281     BLI_freelistN(&ar->panels);
00282 }

00284 /* not area itself */
00285 void BKE_screen_area_free(ScrArea *sa)
00286 {
00287     SpaceType *st= BKE_spacetype_from_id(sa->spacetype);
00288     ARegion *ar;
00289     
00290     for (ar=sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar=ar->next)
00291         BKE_area_region_free(st, ar);
00292 
00293     BLI_freelistN(&sa->regionbase);
00294     
00295     BKE_spacedata_freelist(&sa->spacedata);
00296     
00297     BLI_freelistN(&sa->actionzones);
00298 }
00299 
00300 /* don't free screen itself */
00301 void free_screen(bScreen *sc)
00302 {
00303     ScrArea *sa, *san;
00304     ARegion *ar;
00305     
00306     for (ar=sc->regionbase.first; ar; ar=ar->next)
00307         BKE_area_region_free(NULL, ar);
00308 
00309     BLI_freelistN(&sc->regionbase);
00310     
00311     for (sa= sc->areabase.first; sa; sa= san) {
00312         san= sa->next;
00313         BKE_screen_area_free(sa);
00314     }
00315     
00316     BLI_freelistN(&sc->vertbase);
00317     BLI_freelistN(&sc->edgebase);
00318     BLI_freelistN(&sc->areabase);
00319 }

00321 /* for depsgraph */
00322 unsigned int BKE_screen_visible_layers(bScreen *screen, Scene *scene)
00323 {
00324     ScrArea *sa;
00325     unsigned int layer= 0;
00326 
00327     if (screen) {
00328         /* get all used view3d layers */
00329         for (sa= screen->areabase.first; sa; sa= sa->next)
00330             if (sa->spacetype==SPACE_VIEW3D)
00331                 layer |= ((View3D *)sa->spacedata.first)->lay;
00332     }
00333 
00334     if (!layer)
00335         return scene->lay;
00336 
00337     return layer;
00338 }

00342 /* Find a region of the specified type from the given area */
00343 ARegion *BKE_area_find_region_type(ScrArea *sa, int type)
00344 {
00345     if (sa) {
00346         ARegion *ar;
00347         
00348         for (ar=sa->regionbase.first; ar; ar= ar->next) {
00349             if (ar->regiontype == type)
00350                 return ar;
00351         }
00352     }
00353     return NULL;
00354 }
00355 
00356 /* note, using this function is generally a last resort, you really want to be
00357  * using the context when you can - campbell
00358  * -1 for any type */
00359 struct ScrArea *BKE_screen_find_big_area(struct bScreen *sc, const int spacetype, const short min)
00360 {
00361     ScrArea *sa, *big= NULL;
00362     int size, maxsize= 0;
00363 
00364     for (sa= sc->areabase.first; sa; sa= sa->next) {
00365         if ((spacetype == -1) || sa->spacetype == spacetype) {
00366             if (min <= sa->winx && min <= sa->winy) {
00367                 size= sa->winx*sa->winy;
00368                 if (size > maxsize) {
00369                     maxsize= size;
00370                     big= sa;
00371                 }
00372             }
00373         }
00374     }
00375 
00376     return big;
00377 }
00378 
00379 void BKE_screen_view3d_sync(struct View3D *v3d, struct Scene *scene)
00380 {
00381     int bit;
00382 
00383     if (v3d->scenelock && v3d->localvd==NULL) {
00384         v3d->lay= scene->lay;
00385         v3d->camera= scene->camera;
00386 
00387         if (v3d->camera==NULL) {
00388             ARegion *ar;
00389 
00390             for (ar=v3d->regionbase.first; ar; ar= ar->next) {
00391                 if (ar->regiontype == RGN_TYPE_WINDOW) {
00392                     RegionView3D *rv3d= ar->regiondata;
00393                     if (rv3d->persp==RV3D_CAMOB)
00394                         rv3d->persp= RV3D_PERSP;
00395                 }
00396             }
00397         }
00398 
00399         if ((v3d->lay & v3d->layact) == 0) {
00400             for (bit= 0; bit<32; bit++) {
00401                 if (v3d->lay & (1<<bit)) {
00402                     v3d->layact= 1<<bit;
00403                     break;
00404                 }
00405             }
00406         }
00407     }
00408 }
00409 
00410 void BKE_screen_view3d_scene_sync(bScreen *sc)
00411 {
00412     /* are there cameras in the views that are not in the scene? */
00413     ScrArea *sa;
00414     for (sa= sc->areabase.first; sa; sa= sa->next) {
00415         SpaceLink *sl;
00416         for (sl= sa->spacedata.first; sl; sl= sl->next) {
00417             if (sl->spacetype==SPACE_VIEW3D) {
00418                 View3D *v3d= (View3D*) sl;
00419                 BKE_screen_view3d_sync(v3d, sc->scene);
00420             }
00421         }
00422     }
00423 }
00424 
00425 void BKE_screen_view3d_main_sync(ListBase *screen_lb, Scene *scene)
00426 {
00427     bScreen *sc;
00428     ScrArea *sa;
00429     SpaceLink *sl;
00430 
00431     /* from scene copy to the other views */
00432     for (sc=screen_lb->first; sc; sc=sc->id.next) {
00433         if (sc->scene!=scene)
00434             continue;
00435 
00436         for (sa=sc->areabase.first; sa; sa=sa->next)
00437             for (sl=sa->spacedata.first; sl; sl=sl->next)
00438                 if (sl->spacetype==SPACE_VIEW3D)
00439                     BKE_screen_view3d_sync((View3D*)sl, scene);
00440     }
00441 }

00443 /* magic zoom calculation, no idea what
00444  * it signifies, if you find out, tell me! -zr
00445  */
00446 
00447 /* simple, its magic dude!
00448  * well, to be honest, this gives a natural feeling zooming
00449  * with multiple keypad presses (ton)
00450  */
00451 float BKE_screen_view3d_zoom_to_fac(float camzoom)
00452 {
00453     return powf(((float)M_SQRT2 + camzoom/50.0f), 2.0f) / 4.0f;
00454 }
00455 
00456 float BKE_screen_view3d_zoom_from_fac(float zoomfac)
00457 {
00458     return ((sqrtf(4.0f * zoomfac) - (float)M_SQRT2) * 50.0f);
00459 }
